frameList.name: Rena
frameList.lines: MEDIC? You here? Johnny told me about your shop. It's been so long, I can't stop smiling. You look good, MEDIC.

frameList.name: Rena
choices: What are you doing on this side of town, Rena?

frameList.name: Rena
frameList.lines: It's been difficult, these past few years. Yeah, I've got a job, but at this point, maybe I'd rather be on the streets. Just the other day-

frameList.name: Rena
frameList.lines: Listen, I know we aren't on the best of terms, but I really need this arm. It's hard to work like this... less efficient. If I can't meet my quota, the boss is gonna...

frameList.name: Rena
choices: Rena, I wanna help you. God, I really do. But right now, I just don't have the parts.
I hear you, Rena. Let me help. What kind of arm do you have in mind?

We haven't spoken in years, and you're asking me for favors? I'm sorry about your arm, I really am. I'm in some trouble myself, so you're gonna have to offer me a lot more than sob stories if you want that arm.

frameList.name: Rena
frameList.lines: I thought that'd be the case...

frameList.name: Rena
frameList.lines: I've been scrapping for a while now. With all the accidents happening lately, I was able to find these bits before they were taken to the recycling yard. Think you can work with these?

frameList.name: Rena
frameList.lines: Parts! I have some parts... Credits, too. Whatever you need.

frameList.name: Rena
frameList.lines: See I've got most of the pieces, I just need someone to put them together.

frameList.name: Rena
choices: Shouldn't be too hard, but these parts are pretty old. I can't guarantee quality...

frameList.name: Rena
frameList.lines: Please, MEDIC. I'm so sorry about what I did to you... It was the only way to pay off my debt. It was wrong. I'm sorry.

frameList.name: Rena
choices: Rena, I want to help, but right now... I just can't. No promises, but if you come back next month, I might be able to fix you up.

frameList.name: Rena
frameList.lines: Whatever you can do, I appreciate it...

frameList.name: Rena
choices: Listen, I've been there too. In fact, I'm there right now. I wish I could help, but I just can't.
Don't pull that shit on me, I know what you're trying.

frameList.name: Rena
frameList.lines: But!-... Thank you, MEDIC. Hold onto those parts for me, will you?

frameList.name: Rena
choices: I just hope you'll stay in one piece this time.

frameList.name: Rena
frameList.lines: I understand why you wouldn't trust me, but I really need the help. There's nothing you can do?

frameList.name: Rena
frameList.lines: The only thing I'm trying to do is get that arm. I know you don't trust me, but there's nothing you can do?

frameList.name: Rena
frameList.lines: Also, I wanted to apologize. What I did to you... It was the only way to pay off my debt. It was wrong. I'm sorry.

frameList.name: Rena
choices: I can try to figure something out but these parts are old. Don't come crying if it doesn't work.
I'm not changing my mind, Rena. You're gonna have to find someone else.

frameList.name: Rena
choices: I'm not changing my mind, Rena. You're gonna have to find someone else.

frameList.name: Rena
choices: Why you did it's none of my business. I'll get you that arm.
Listen, Rena. It was a long time ago. I'd have done the same.

frameList.name: Rena
frameList.lines: Whatever you can do, I appreciate it...

frameList.name: Rena
frameList.lines: Thanks for understanding. I'll be looking forward to that arm.

frameList.name: Rena
choices: Just try to stay in one piece this time.
